Node.definition: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= pertaining to being the latest in a chronological range of events, which may be situated in either past, present, or future
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Obed (עֹובֵד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of David (דָּוִד)
= a male human
= a (non eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation
= action by which one expresses utters words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state in which humans experience fear
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
= process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well being
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
= mass of visible, condensed watery vapor floating in the air; ► producing rain; ≈ God is said to envelop himself with clouds
= process by which an object gives out or reflects a bright light
= water coming down from the sky, which is indispensable for sustaining human life, but can be both refreshing and destructive
= a general term for plants, ► used as food by humans and animals; ≈ associated with frailty, but also with prosperity

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen ◄ as if it were an object placed in a certain position
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

Node.gloss: to cause to sprout|to make come up|to cause to bring forth
Node.definition: = causative process by which a deity or the earth causes plants or horns to come up and start growing; ≈ sometimes extended to denote the coming in existence of people, conditions, or activities

possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence: = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way
= small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction

Node.gloss: to drive out|to drive away|to banish|to reject
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans force other humans to leave a certain location

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, either or not deliberately
probably read אִם לֹא
= a strong, hard magnetic silvery grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

m.definition: see יֹשֵׁב בַּשֶּׁבֶת (יֹשֵׁב בַּשֶּׁבֶת)|= man, also known as Jashobeam (יָשָׁבְעָם) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)

Node.definition: = inhabitant of Tahkemon
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which a countable entity is eight in number
= state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object|= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
literally: foot; hence: = a single instance in a range of repeated events
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= particle linking two elements and indicating that Y has a higher status than X
= man; ◄ son of Dodo (דֹּודֹו) (Dodai) (דֹּודַי) ► warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption|= man, also known as Dodai (דֹּודַי) ► father of Eleazar (אֶלְעָזָר) warrior during the time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= descendant of Ahoah (אֲחֹוחַ) ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to reproach|to taunt|to insult|to defy|to blaspheme
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans make an effort to arouse an emotion of shame in (other) humans or deities; ◄ by their words or actions
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y

Node.gloss: to grow weary|to wear oneself out|to labor|to toil
Node.definition: = action by which humans are engaged in laborious activity which requires a lot of energy and ultimately results in exhaustion

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= state in which an object is positioned around or against another object in such a way that the two cannot be separated easily

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue of humans in need
= state in which an event has a high intensity

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities
= action by which a human being forcefully removes things of value, such as clothes, arms, and jewelry, from a dead body
= particle linking two elements and indicating that Y has a higher status than X
= man; ◄ son of Agee (אָגֵא) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Shammah (שַׁמָּא) warrior, time of king David (דָּוִד)
exact meaning unsure: = inhabitant of a town called Harar, or member of a clan called Hararites
= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= group of people, related by kinship
= object that is owned by someone; ◄ usually with the underlying assumption that it has been shared out to that person (or his ancestors) in the past

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

= type of vegetable from a low branched plant with a weak stem; its flowers develop into a short pod with only one seed inside, about the size of a small pea, one type of which is reddish brown in color; ◄ Lens culinaris; ► typically used in soups and stews
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose
= object that is owned by someone; ◄ usually with the underlying assumption that it has been shared out to that person (or his ancestors) in the past
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)

= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number

= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a large open place on the side of a rock or mountain, ► used for burying and hiding, or as a temporary dwelling place
= town; ◄ located in the foothills (שְׁפֵלָה) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► David (דָּוִד) and his men used to hide in a nearby cave
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= state in which an individual or group of people dwells at a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

= area shaped and located in such a way that it is hard to access and can be easily defended against enemies; ◄ this can be a natural stronghold in the mountains (e.g. caves) or a construction erected by humans in populated areas; ≈ often associated with security and sometimes used as an epithet for leaders or deities that are considered providers of security
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= town; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► ancestral town of King David (דָּוִד)
= state in which humans sense a physical craving for food or alcoholic drinks; this desire is associated with one's נֶפֶשׁ (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern
= town; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► ancestral town of King David (דָּוִד)

= action by which humans find their way by breaking through all obstacles that keep them from moving forward
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= causative action by which humans let down a bucket like container attached to a rope into a well in order to draw water from it

= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression and strength

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= frozen crystallized water vapor in the form of very white flakes which fall as precipitation from the sky and cover the ground during freezing cold weather; as soon as the temperature rises above freezing, it melts and becomes water; ≈ associated with cold, whiteness, or purity
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= descendant or inhabitant of Mizraim (מִצְרַיִם) (Egypt)
literally: a person of sight; hence: = a person of an imposing size

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= descendant or inhabitant of Mizraim (מִצְרַיִם) (Egypt)
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= a relatively short, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp metal head or point; used for piercing by thrusting
= action by which humans take property unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= descendant or inhabitant of Mizraim (מִצְרַיִם) (Egypt)
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= man, also known as Benaiah (בְּנָיָה) ◄ son of Jehoiada (יְהֹויָדָע) ► warrior and army commander under kings David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Benaiah (בְּנָיָהוּ) warrior, later army commander of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה)
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number

Node.gloss: to be honorable|to be worthy of honor|to be renowned
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are regarded as worthy of honor and respect
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

Node.gloss: to place (in a position) > to appoint
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans a certain task or responsibility
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► warrior
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= man; ◄ son of Dodo (דֹּודֹו) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Elhanan (אֶלְחָנָן) warrior during the time of king David (דָּוִד)
= town; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► ancestral town of King David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Harod
= man; ◄ from Harod; ► warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Harod
= man; ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Pelet (פֶּלֶט)
= man; ◄ son of Ikkesh (עִקֵּשׁ) from Tekoa (תְּקֹועַ) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Ira (עִירָא) a warrior from Tekoa (תְּקֹועַ) during time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Tekoa (תְּקֹועַ)
= man; ◄ from Anatoth (עַנְּתֹתִי) ► commander in army of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Anatoth (עֲנָתֹות)
= man, also known as Sibbecai (סִבְּכַי) ◄ from Hushah (חֻשָׁתִי) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Hushah (חוּשָׁה)
= man, also known as Ilai (עִילַי) ◄ descendant of Ahoah (אֲחֹוחַ) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= descendant of Ahoah (אֲחֹוחַ) ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= man; ◄ from Netophah (נְטֹפָה) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Netophah (נְטֹופָה) a town in the territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= man, also known as Heled (חֵלֶד) and Heldai (חֶלְדַּי) ◄ son of Baanah (בַּעֲנָה) from Netophah (נְטֹופָתִי) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Heleb (חֵלֶב) or Heled (חֵלֶד) warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Netophah (נְטֹופָה) a town in the territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= man; ◄ son of Ribai (רִיבַי) from Gibeah (גִּבְעָה) ► warrior, time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of Ithai (אִיתַי) Ittai (אִתַּי) warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)

= town, possibly to be identified with Geba (גֶּבַע) ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► place where someone's concubine (פִּילֶגֶשׁ) was raped by a large group of men; home town of King Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man, also known as Benaiah (בְּנָיָה) ◄ from Pirathon (פִּרְעָתֹונִי) ► warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Pirathon (פִּרְעָתֹון)
= man, also known as Hurai (חוּרַי) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= mountainous region, ◄ located in the territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם)
= man, also known as Abiel (אֲבִיאֵל) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = inhabitant of Beth Arabah (בֵּית הָעֲרָבָה)
= man; ► warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Bahurim (בַּחוּרִים)
= man; ◄ from Shaalbon (שַׁעַלְבֹנִי) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Shaalbim (שַׁעַלְבִים) Shaalabbin (שַׁעֲלַבִּין)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man, also known as Hashem (הָשֵׁם) ► father of warriors; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ► warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)
exact meaning unsure: = inhabitant of a town called Harar, or member of a clan called Hararites
= man; ◄ son of Sachar (שָׂכָר) or Sharar (שָׁרָר) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man, also known as Sachar (שָׂכָר) ► father of Ahiam (אֲחִיאָם) warrior, time of king David (דָּוִד)
exact meaning unsure: = inhabitant of a town called Harar, or member of a clan called Hararites
= man; ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ from Maacah (מַעֲכָה) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= inhabitant of Maacah (מַעֲכָה) Maacath (מַעֲכָת)
= man, also known as Ammiel (עַמִּיאֵל) ◄ son of Ahitophel (אֲחִיתֹפֶל) ► warrior; father of Bathsheba (בַּת־שֶׁבַע) wife of Uriah (אוּרִיָּה) and David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ from Giloh (גִּילֹנִי) ► counselor of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Giloh (גִּלֹה)
= man, also known as Hezro (חֶצְרֹו) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Carmel (כַּרְמֶל) ◄ located in the hill country (הַר) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= man, also known as Naarai (נַעֲרַי) ◄ from Arab (אַרְבִּי) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Arab (אֲרַב)
= man; ◄ son of Nathan (נָתָן) from Zobah (צֹובָה) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of warrior, time of king David (דָּוִד)

= Aramean kingdom, also known as Aram Zobah (אֲרַם צֹובָא) ◄ located north of Damascus (דַּמֶּשֶׂק) ► ruled by Hadadezer (הֲדַדְעֶזֶר) defeated and subjugated by David (דָּוִד) and then controlled by Solomon
= man; ◄ from Gad (גָּד) ► warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)
= member of tribe of Gad (גָּד)
= man; ◄ an Ammonite (עַמֹּונִי) ► one of the thirty warriors or chiefs of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Ammon (עַמֹּון)
= man; ► warrior; armour bearer of Joab (יֹואָב) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Beeroth (בְּאֵרֹות) territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

Node.gloss: to take up|to lift up|to carry
Node.definition: literally: to lift up; hence: = action by which humans take hold of objects with their hands, with the intention of holding them or bringing them to another location
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= woman; ◄ daughter of Nahash (נָחָשׁ) ► sister of David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ Ithrite (יִתְרִי) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= clan; ◄ from Kiriath Jearim (קִרְיַת יְעָרִים)
= man; ◄ Ithrite (יִתְרִי) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= clan; ◄ from Kiriath Jearim (קִרְיַת יְעָרִים)
= man; ◄ Hittite (חִתִּי) ► warrior; husband of Bathsheba (בַּת־שֶׁבַע) killed on the authority of David (דָּוִד)
= member of ethnic group inhabiting Canaan (כְּנַעַן) before arrival of Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ◄ regarded as descendants of Heth (חֵת)
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
